mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_WRITER, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS ENROLL_DATE, HITS FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%${searchNotice}%' OR NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE '%${searchNotice}%'
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_WRITER, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD') ENROLL_DATE, HITS FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD') ENROLL_DATE, HITS FROM "NOTICE" WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
